bibl.title: New Evidence for the Steering System of the Egyptian Baris (Herodotus 2.96).
International Journal of Nautical Archaeology and Underwater Exploration

bibl.note: Ship 17 [of Thonis-Heracleion, mid 5th - mid 4th century B.C.] and Herodotus' baris. - Axial rudders in Ancient Egypt. - Evidence for an Axial Rudder on Ship 17. - Discussion. - Conclusions. - Avec résumé en anglais.
